homepage_subtitle: Flexxa is an all-in-one digital business payments solution. It’s compliant with Saudi Labor Law, makes payroll a breeze, and keeps your operational costs in check.
homepage_opportunity_title: A promising frontier for fintech entrepreneurs.
homepage_opportunity_subtitle_1: A thriving digital economy in Saudi Arabia will create an additional 200,000 jobs by 2025. It'll also drive the development of smarter and more sustainable cities. That’s why the Saudi government is committed to launching an entrepreneurial ecosystem that can support digital transformation.
homepage_opportunity_subtitle_2: Saudi Arabia is currently lacking the business-focused fintech solutions it needs. With a market this big, that’s an oppurtunity that comes once in a lifetime.
einvoice_subtitle: Invoice your customers through SMS, email, and Whatsapp. Instantly.
getpaid_title: A smarter way to invoice your clients.
getpaid_text_1: Whether you're a freelancer, independent contractor, online seller, or even a shop owner, Flexxa will make your life easier.
getpaid_text_2: Our system helps you create professional invoices fast and send them to your clients. When your clients process the invoice, you'll get paid instantly.
benefit_3: Get paid faster for better cashflow
howisworking_subtitle: Customize your invoice. Send it via your preferred channel. Get the money into your chosen bank account.
howisworking_tab2_title: Send via SMS, Whatsapp or custom link
howisworking_appfeatures_templates_1_tex: Give your invoices a professional look by adding your logo and company branding from the Flexxa app. No design software is needed.
howisworking_appfeatures_templates_2_tex: Save your time by choosing from our pre-made invoice templates. We’ve got you covered with more than 500 templates to choose from.
howisworking_appfeatures_sendsms_1_text: Simplify invoice payments for your clients with our flexible invoicing process. Send your invoice via SMS, Whatsapp, or generate a custom payment link.
howisworking_appfeatures_sendsms_2_text: Stop worrying about the technical aspects of sending an invoice. No matter what invoicing method you choose, your invoice is a few clicks away with Flexxa.
howisworking_appfeatures_getpaid_1_text: Get your invoice payments deposited in the bank accounts you choose. Flexxa makes adding your bank accounts a smooth and seamless process.
howisworking_appfeatures_getpaid_2_text: Flexxa bridges the gap between cash and digital transaction. When someone pays your invoice, they money will be deposited in your bank account instantly.
getmoredone_title: Save your time and money with Flexxa.
getmoredone_subtitle: Creating professional invoices requires a lot of time. And a team that costs a lot of money. With Flexxa, you can do it all with a few clicks.
getmoredone_screen1_text: Make life easier for your clients with invoices that support different payment options.
getmoredone_screen2_text: Stay on top of your payment requests with our smart reminders that help you keep track of everything.
getmoredone_screen3_text: Track your invoices with our smart reminders that update you on the status of every invoice.
tools_subtitle: Our solutions make your business more efficient, and simplify regulations compliance.
about_approach_title: The future of digital transactions begins now.
about_approach_tab_1_text: Empowering business owners in Saudi and the MENA regions with intuitive digital transaction solutions.
about_approach_tab_2_text: An all-in-one digital transactions platform that offers modern solutions for modern challenges.
about_whysaudi_tab_1_text: The Kingdom has a solid infrastructure that can support all types of fintech innovation.
about_whysaudi_tab_2_text: Moving towards a cashless society is a priority for the Saudi government. It’s a part of vision 2030.
about_whysaudi_tab_3_text: The Saudi government is supporting enterpreneurs and creating an environment where they can thrive.
about_teams_title: Empowering business owners in the MENA region
about_teams_text: The technology sector is developing fast. And so is Saudi Arabia. With this rapid development, business owners are trying to keep up. It's a new digital era that requires a new toolset. And that’s what we're here to do: Provide businesses of all sizes with the digital tools they need to thrive.
payroll_title: A payroll solution for the digital era.
payroll_subtitle: Flexxa gives you a smart payroll solutions that increases your employee satisfaction, and lowers your operational costs.
payroll_solution_title: A modern solution for modern challenges.
payroll_solution_subtitle: Streamline your payroll process with a smart tool that’s compliant with Labor Law.
payroll_solution_box_1_text: Manage and process your payroll from a single, intuitive app. No more spreadsheets, paper, or costly teams to manage the admin work.
payroll_solution_box_2_text: Simplify cross-border transfers for your employees. With Flexxa, they can send remittances home from their accounts.
payroll_solution_box_3_text: Issue custom VISA Debit Cards for your employees. They can use the cards to withdraw their salaries from their Flexxa accounts.
payroll_solution_box_4_text: Give your employees the freedom of paying their bills online, and paying at stores with our contactless VISA card.
payroll_tab_text_0: Instantly setup Digital Salary accounts for your employees and request customized Debit cards without the hassle of visiting your local bank.
payroll_tab_title_1: One Platform to Manage it all.
payroll_tab_text_1: Self-manage the salary payment process with greater visibility and control on payouts; salaries are uploaded within minutes. Pull in Data from your existing HRMS (Human Resources Management System).
payroll_tab_title_2: Keep track of your employees’ work.
payroll_tab_text_2: Find out how many hours an employee has worked with our intuitive Work Tracker functionality. Your employees’ attendance, deductions, overtime, and more, are always a few clicks away.
payroll_tab_text_3: Save valuable time and effort by streamlining your payroll process. With Flexxa’s payroll automation features, you can run your payroll in minutes instead of days.
payroll_tab_title_4: Stay on top of your business performance.
payroll_tab_text_4: Make well-informed business decisions with the help of our detailed reports. We cover everything from employee leaves to unpaid invoices.
payroll_transfer_title: Transfer salaries digitally, in compliance with Labor Law.
payroll_transfer_safety_subtitle: Say hello to cutting-edge security and data protection.
payroll_transfer_safety_text: At Flexxa, we built Data Security at its core. The result is a digital transactions platform that gives you the peace of mind you’re looking for without any compromises to the security of your data.
payroll_commodo_text: Open banking is driving innovation in the banking sector. It’s a practice that empowers clients with better financial products. At Flexxa, we're revolutionizing digital business transactions in the Kingdom. That's why we embrace open banking practices.
